        API to fetch value of url and tokens for the provided service id's
        Specified by:
        getValueForServiceIds in interface AIKMInterface
        Parameters:
        serviceIds - - pass service_id to fetch url and tokens
        aiSdPreference - - pass country or language preference
        replacement - - pass query parameters if required as map
        onGetServicesListener - - call back listener to callee
        Throws:
        AIKMJsonFileNotFoundException - - Exception is thrown when AIKMap.json is not found in assets
